src_text: Ugbu a, anyị nwere ụmụ oke ọnwa anọ na-arịabu ọrịa shuga mana ha anaghị arịazi ya.
ref_text: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
hyp_text: Currently, we have four-month-old babies who are suffering from diabetes but are not receiving treatment.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: N'ụbọchị Mọnde, Sara Danius, onye odeakwụkwọ Nobel kọmitii maka akwụkwọ agụmagụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Swidin, kwuputara n'ihu ọha na ihe omume redio na Sveriges Redio dị na Swidin, mgbe o siere kọmitii ahụ ike inweta Bob Dilan gbasara mmeri na ihe nrite Nobel na mpaghara Akwụkwọ agụmagụ nke afọ 2016 o nwetara, na ha ahapụlarị mbọ ha na-agba inweta ya.
ref_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
hyp_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, the Permanent Secretary of the Swedish Academy for Literature, announced on Swedish Radio in Sweden that she would step down from the committee after it was unable to award the Nobel Prize in Literature for 2016, which was won by Bob Dylan, and that they would not give it to him.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

src_text: Ahuru Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, na Blue Ash, Ohio otu sobob di nso 15 miles n’ebe ugwu Cincinnati ka o dine n’ala n’akuku okporouzo naani ihe oyi bu tshirt na uwe ime, otu osi noro gosiri na ono n’okpuru ike ogwu.
ref_text: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
hyp_text: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, of Blue Ash, Ohio, was killed in a 15-mile radius north of Cincinnati after being struck by a train while wearing a t-shirt and shorts, and his body was found under a bridge.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

src_text: Webụsaịtị akụkọ ntụrụndụ TMZ ghọtara onye na-ese fòto ahụ kwụsịrị ụgbọala ya n'akụkụ nke ọzọ nke okporo ámá Sepulveda sara mbara nwere ụmụ osisi akwụwara n'akụkụ ya ma nwaa ị see fòto nkwụsị ndị uwe ojii tupu ya agafee okporo ụzọ wee gaa n'ihu, na-akpali onye uwe ojii Njeghari ilekota Nnukwu okporo ụzọ anya nke California na-eduzi okporo ụzọ iji nyeghachi ya iwu gafeghachị , ugboro abụọ.

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.

[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

src_text: Na 1895, mgbe a dachara n’Agha Sino-Japanese Mbụ (1894-1895), ọchịchị Qing ahụ mere mbịanye aka na Nkwekọrịta nke Shimonoseki ahụ, site na nke o jiri nyefee Japan ọbụbụeze nke Taiwan, nke na-achị agwaetiti ahụ ruo 1945.
ref_text: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.

src_text: N'Oktoba 6, 1789, ụmụ nwanyị ahịa iwe ji yiri Eze Luwi XVI oke egwu mgbe ha si na Versailles dọrọ ya, nwunye ya Marịa Antwanet, obere ụmụ ha abụọ (Marịa Teriza dị afọ 11 na Luwi-Chals dị afọ anọ), na nwanne nwanyị Eze, Madam Elizabet, dọghachi ha na Parii.
ref_text: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
hyp_text: On October 6, 1789, the women of the market stormed the Palace of Versailles, confronting King Louis XVI, his wife Marie Antoinette, their two children (Marie-Thérèse was 11 and Louis-Charles was 4), and his sister-in-law, Madame Elizabeth, and forced them to return to Paris.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Ọtụtụ nkọwa e nyere nkwenyesiike kenkanụzụ nwere echiche izugbe abụọ: na mmepụta nkanụzụ n'onwe ya na-agbaso usoro nke gbapụrụ iche site na nkwanye nke omenala maọbụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, ya na kwa na nkanụzụ n'aka nke ya nwere "mmekpaahụ" ọ na-enye ọhaobodo nke dị adị, n'abụghị nke sitere na mmekọrịta.
ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

src_text: Na onodu romanticism, ala ebe onye no bu ihe na kpu omume mmadu, k’oge na aga odinala na omenala metutara ala ebe obibi amalite, nkea mere ndi mmadu jiri nabata odinala na omenala ndia maka na ha na ya bu odinala na omenala nwere nkwekorita karia iwu ana atukwasa n’isi oha.
ref_text: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
hyp_text: Under the influence of romanticism, the place where one's true self is not in harmony with the societal norms, at a time when the societal norms and customs were rigid, the individual's life was stifled, which made people resort to rebelling against the societal norms and customs because they believed that the societal norms and customs were oppressive and stifling individual freedom.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

src_text: N’iji Yoga Kundalini ike Kundalini (ike mmepe anya) bụ nke etetara site n’ụmụ postchọ yoga, mgbatị ahụ iku ume, ukwe ntụgharị uche na ihe ngosi.
ref_text: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.
hyp_text: The practice of Kundalini Yoga, which is a means of spiritual growth, is derived from postures of yoga, breath control, mental focus, and visualization.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Mana, o gbughi oge ka atụmatụ a niile laa n'efu, mgbe ihe karịrị ndị Sọviet Yunịọn Red Amị 800,000 banyere, kepụta ogige agha ndị Belarụs na Yukren, ka ha wakpochara akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Poland na nnupu isi nye Nkwekọrịta Udo Riga, Nkwekọrịta Udo Sọviet Yunịọn na Poland, na ọtụtụ nkwekọrịta ndị ọzọ, ma nke dị n'etiti mba abụọ, na nke dị n'etiti ọtụtụ mba.
ref_text: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
hyp_text: However, with the collapse of the Soviet Union, more than 800,000 Soviet troops withdrew from Belarus and Ukraine, and then occupied parts of western Poland, handed over the Riga Agreement, the Soviet-Polish Agreement, and other agreements, both between two countries and among multiple countries.

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.

[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

[Igbo]: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Igbo]: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Igbo]: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Igbo]: Akụkụ Beljọm ga nke ugbua bụbu akụkụ Lukzembọọgụ n’oge gara aga mana mechaa bụrụ Beljian mgbe e nwere mgbanwe ọchịchị n’ike nke Beljian n'afọ 1830 ga.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Igbo]: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}
